wishes.name: Uncle Peter
wishes.advice: It will take a lot of patience, empathy and humour. Also, try to assume good intentions.

wishes.name: Auntie Pasa
wishes.advice: The real sign of love is not the ability to read another's mind - rather, it probably is the willingness to explain and to listen calmly.

wishes.name: Auntie Mag
wishes.advice: Frustration doesn’t just stem from things being difficult – only from them being unexpectedly difficult.

wishes.name: Uncle Peter
wishes.advice: Maturity is founded, really, on recognizing one's craziness - if we are not regularly and deeply embarrassed about who we are, it is because we have a dangerous capacity for selective memory.

wishes.name: Mom
wishes.advice: It's never as glamorous as it seems. Get ready for administration, administration, administration.
